comment.body: Ah, the fun of working with code. Change one thing, everything breaks!
Every little bit helps! I'm not a developer, I just use GitHub for bug reports.

I'd imagine if they're a pharmacist, they'd have some basic knowledge of what common drugs would accomplish, even if they didn't know the reactions behind it. Such knowledge really doesn't need to extend beyond "drug X does Y and Z, don't take more than N milligrams per day". 

Us common folk are just clueless. :P
